mil3.2.6:1.6_1: imaṁyeva nāmarūpaṁ paṭisandahati, iminā pana, mahārāja,
mil3.2.6:1.6_2: nāmarūpena kammaṁ karoti sobhanaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā,
mil3.2.6:1.7_2: nanu so mutto bhavissati pāpakehi kammehī”ti?
mil3.2.6:2.2_1: kocideva puriso aññatarassa purisassa ambaṁ avahareyya,
mil3.2.6:2.2_2: tamenaṁ ambasāmiko gahetvā rañño dasseyya ‘iminā, deva,
mil3.2.6:2.2_3: purisena mayhaṁ ambā avahaṭā’ti, so evaṁ vadeyya ‘nāhaṁ, deva, imassa ambe avaharāmi, aññe te ambā, ye iminā ropitā, aññe te ambā, ye mayā avahaṭā, nāhaṁ daṇḍappatto’ti.
mil3.2.6:2.6_1: ambaṁ appaccakkhāya pacchimena ambena so puriso daṇḍappatto bhaveyyā”ti.
mil3.2.6:2.7_1: iminā nāmarūpena kammaṁ karoti sobhanaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā,
mil3.2.6:3.2_1: kocideva puriso aññatarassa purisassa sāliṁ avahareyya …pe…
mil3.2.6:3.4_1: koci puriso hemantakāle aggiṁ jāletvā visibbetvā avijjhāpetvā pakkameyya,
mil3.2.6:3.4_2: atha kho so aggi aññatarassa purisassa khettaṁ ḍaheyya,
mil3.2.6:3.4_3: tamenaṁ khettasāmiko gahetvā rañño dasseyya ‘iminā, deva,
mil3.2.6:3.5_0: So evaṁ vadeyya ‘nāhaṁ, deva, imassa khettaṁ jhāpemi, añño so aggi, yo mayā avijjhāpito, añño so aggi, yenimassa khettaṁ daḍḍhaṁ, nāhaṁ daṇḍappatto’ti.
mil3.2.6:3.9_1: aggiṁ appaccakkhāya pacchimena agginā so puriso daṇḍappatto bhaveyyā”ti.
mil3.2.6:3.10_1: iminā nāmarūpena kammaṁ karoti sobhanaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā,
mil3.2.6:4.2_1: kocideva puriso padīpaṁ ādāya pāsādaṁ abhirūhitvā bhuñjeyya,
mil3.2.6:4.2_5: gāmajano taṁ purisaṁ gahetvā evaṁ vadeyya ‘kissa tvaṁ, bho purisa, gāmaṁ jhāpesī’ti, so evaṁ vadeyya ‘nāhaṁ, bho, gāmaṁ jhāpemi, añño so padīpaggi, yassāhaṁ ālokena bhuñjiṁ, añño so aggi, yena gāmo jhāpito’ti,
mil3.2.6:4.2_6: te vivadamānā tava santike āgaccheyyuṁ, kassa tvaṁ, mahārāja, aṭṭaṁ dhāreyyāsī”ti?
mil3.2.6:4.5_1: api ca tato eva so aggi nibbatto”ti.
mil3.2.6:5.2_1: kocideva puriso dahariṁ dārikaṁ vāretvā suṅkaṁ datvā pakkameyya.
mil3.2.6:5.3_0: Sā aparena samayena mahatī assa vayappattā,
mil3.2.6:5.3_1: tato añño puriso suṅkaṁ datvā vivāhaṁ kareyya,
mil3.2.6:5.3_2: itaro āgantvā evaṁ vadeyya ‘kissa pana me tvaṁ, ambho purisa, bhariyaṁ nesī’ti?
mil3.2.6:5.4_0: So evaṁ vadeyya ‘nāhaṁ tava bhariyaṁ nemi,
mil3.2.6:5.4_2: yā tayā vāritā ca dinnasuṅkā ca,
mil3.2.6:5.4_3: aññāyaṁ dārikā mahatī vayappattā mayā vāritā ca dinnasuṅkā cā’ti,
mil3.2.6:5.8_1: api ca tatoyeva sā mahatī nibbattā”ti.
mil3.2.6:6.2_1: kocideva puriso gopālakassa hatthato khīraghaṭaṁ kiṇitvā tasseva hatthe nikkhipitvā pakkameyya ‘sve gahetvā gamissāmī’ti,
mil3.2.6:6.3_0: So āgantvā evaṁ vadeyya ‘dehi me khīraghaṭan’ti.
mil3.2.6:6.5_0: Itaro evaṁ vadeyya ‘nāhaṁ tava hatthato dadhiṁ kiṇāmi, dehi me khīraghaṭan’ti.
mil3.2.6:6.6_0: So evaṁ vadeyya ‘ajānato te khīraṁ dadhibhūtan’ti te vivadamānā tava santike āgaccheyyuṁ, kassa tvaṁ, mahārāja, aṭṭaṁ dhāreyyāsī”ti?
mil3.2.6:6.9_1: api ca tato yeva taṁ nibbattan”ti.
mil3.2.6:6.10_3: api ca tato yeva taṁ nibbattaṁ,
